long_description: Stay warm in the coldest, wettest weather-pull on this versatile balaclava that you can wear three ways. A waterproof, windproof, breathable Weather Shield(R) membrane is laminated between the nylon outer shell and insulating lining for warmth. Nylon outer face is tough yet flexible to allow complete comfort; fleece inner face is soft and warm against your skin. Wear three ways: as a neck gaiter only, as a face shield/neck gaiter or as a full hood.
